ApiErrors.alreadyJoined: You have joined this game already.
ApiErrors.gameMasterCannotLeave: The game master cannot leave the game.
ApiErrors.inactivePlayer: Only the active player can perform this operation.
ApiErrors.insufficientTokens: You don't have enough tokens to perform this operation.
ApiErrors.invalidPosition: This position exceeds the boundaries of the timeline.
ApiErrors.invalidSpotifyAuthToken: The Spotify authorization code is invalid.
ApiErrors.invalidSpotifyRefreshToken: The Spotify refresh token is invalid.
ApiErrors.noGameMaster: Only the game master can perform this operation.
ApiErrors.turnCompleted: You have already completed this turn.
ApiErrors.turnGuessed: You can only guess once per turn.
ApiErrors.turnPassed: You have already passed this turn.
ApiErrors.turnRevisionMismatch: Your guess was ignored because the current track was exchanged by another player.
ApiErrors.unexpectedState: The game is not in the correct state to perform this operation.
ApiErrors.unsupportedSpotifyProduct: Spotify Premium is required to create a game.
ApiErrors.validationError: The entered data is invalid. Please check and try again.
ApiErrors.wrongCredentials: The entered username or password is wrong. Please try again.
CreateGameView.SettingsForm.creditsStric: Accuracy of artist names and title
CreateGameView.SettingsForm.enableCatchU: Players who are behind receive a small token boost at the start of each round.
CreateGameView.SettingsForm.initialToken: Each player starts the game {value, plural, =0 {without any tokens} =1 {with #{nbsp}token} other {with #{nbsp}tokens}}.
CreateGameView.SettingsForm.maxTokens.he: Players cannot have more than {value, plural, =1 {with #{nbsp}token} other {with #{nbsp}tokens}}.
CreateGameView.SettingsForm.timelineLeng: The game ends when a single player has at least {value}{nbsp}tracks in their trackline.
CreditsStrictness.descriptions.exact: Artist names and title need to match <bold>exactly</bold>. Players must guess <bold>every artist</bold> of a track.
CreditsStrictness.descriptions.moderate: <bold>Small differences</bold> of artist names and title are tolerated. Players only need to guess <bold>one artist</bold> of a track.
CreditsStrictness.descriptions.relaxed: <bold>Rough differences</bold> of artist names and title are tolerated. Players only need to guess <bold>one artist</bold> of a track.
CreditsStrictness.descriptions.strict: <bold>Small differences</bold> of artist names and title are tolerated. Players must guess <bold>every artist</bold> of a track.
FormValidation.maxLength: This field must be no longer than {value} characters.
FormValidation.minLength: This field must contain at least {value} characters.
GameTurnGuessingView.CorrectionProposalM: If you believe the release year is incorrect, you can suggest a different one. If the majority of players agree with your suggestion, the scoring will be updated accordingly.
GameTurnGuessingView.CountdownSnackbar.r: You only have {seconds}s left to guess.
Do you want to exchange the current track by paying <bold>{cost, plural, =1 {#{nbsp}token} other {#{nbsp}tokens}}</bold>?
GameTurnGuessingView.GuessModal.tokenWar: You have only {count, plural, =1 {#{nbsp}token} other {#{nbsp}tokens}} left. If you're wrong, you won't be able to challenge other players until you earn new tokens.
GameTurnGuessingView.GuessReleaseYearMod: You can earn an extra token when guessing the exact year the playing track has been released. You cannot loose any token even if you're wrong.
GameTurnGuessingView.PassTurnModal.conte: Do you really want to pass this turn and reject guessing the track?
Do you really want to pass this turn and reject guessing the artist and title of the track?
Do you really want to pass this turn and reject guessing the release year of the track?
Do you really want to pass this turn?
GameTurnGuessingView.StatusBar.challenge: {count, plural, =0 {Nobody has} one {{count} player has} other {{count} players have}} challenged you.
{count, plural, =0 {Nobody has} one {{count} player has} other {{count} players have}} challenged the active player.
You have just exchanged this track for a new one. All previous guesses have been discarded.
{username} has just exchanged this track for a new one. All previous guesses have been discarded.

GameTurnGuessingView.TurnInfoPopup.catch: You gained {count, plural, =1 {#{nbsp}token} other {#{nbsp}tokens}}. Time for a comeback!
GameTurnScoringView.BuyTrackModal.messag: Do you want to spend <bold>{cost, plural, =1 {#{nbsp}token} other {#{nbsp}tokens}}</bold> to buy an extra track for your timeline?
GameTurnScoringView.BuyTrackReminderModa: You have enough tokens to add an extra track to your timeline. Are you sure you want to continue without buying one?
GameTurnScoringView.CorrectionProposalVo: {isCurrentUser, select, true {Your} other {{username}}} proposal to change the track's release year to <bold>{releaseYear}</bold> has been accepted. The scoring was updated accordingly.
{isCurrentUser, select, true {Your} other {{username}}} proposal to change the track's release year to <bold>{releaseYear}</bold> has been rejected.

{isCurrentUser, select, true {You have} other {{username} has}} suggested changing the track's release year to <bold>{releaseYear}</bold>. If at least half of the players agree, the scoring will be updated accordingly.
GameTurnScoringView.MaxTokenHint.tooltip: This player has reached the maximum number of tokens.
GameTurnScoringView.MaxTokenWarningSnack: You cannot have more than {limit, plural, =1 {#{nbsp}token} other {#{nbsp}tokens}}. You should spend some for buying a track.
GameTurnScoringView.TrackBoughtPopup.des: This track is now part of your timeline.
